subject: Personal Finance
title: Default Settings Matter
description: A quick win: understand Default Settings Matter.

hook.text: Countries with opt-out organ donation get 90% participation. Opt-in countries get 15%.

buildup.text: Defaults work because humans tend to accept whatever option requires no action.

discovery.text: Companies that auto-enroll employees in retirement plans see dramatically higher savings.

twist.text: The choice hasn't changed. The effort to act has. Laziness becomes your financial ally.

climax.text: Thaler calls this 'libertarian paternalism' â€” nudging people without removing freedom.

punchline.text: Set it once. Let inertia do the rest.

quiz.question: Why are default settings powerful in financial decisions?
options: People stick with whatever requires no action
